overview: Amidst an impending climate-accelerated apocalypse, dyke delivery driver Golda drops off  strange packages to survivors in denial who seek pleasure, trivia, and meaning in their final days. Before the decaying sun sets, sheâ€™ll convene new friends, allow herself to fall in love, and uncover the bizarre satisfaction in acquiescing to doom.
tagline: A love story at the end of the world.
title: Shelf Life
